items.question: Can you integrate with my current CRM and tools?
items.answer: Absolutely. Works best if your tools play nice with Zapier, Make, or have an API — but we can handle the weird ones too.

items.question: Do I need technical expertise to work with you?
items.answer: Zero. You focus on selling — I'll handle the nerdy stuff behind the curtain.

items.question: How quickly can I expect results?
items.answer: Most teams see more replies, better lead quality, and fewer headaches within the first month.

items.question: What if I'm not even sure what I need?
items.answer: No problem — bring your chaos to the free strategy call and I'll bring the clarity.

items.question: Is this just another AI tool?
items.answer: Nope. This isn't some off-the-shelf tool — it's hands-on consulting plus custom-built automation tailored to your process, tools, and goals.

items.question: Do I need to commit to the monthly plan?
items.answer: Not at all. You can stop after getting your Custom AI Sales Engine built and run it yourself. The monthly plan is optional for teams who want ongoing optimization and support.

about.title: Meet Vitor, Founder of Verdit
content: For 20 years, I've tackled everything from trading platforms to AI-driven smart contracts, turning messy processes into frictionless flows is my favorite kind of magic.
But here's the big lesson: it's never about the "fanciest" tool. It's about a system that actually fits your workflow.

I founded Verdit so lean sales teams don't have to do what big companies do—throw more people at the problem. Instead, we build automations that just work, without drowning you in new software or forcing a whole new process.

If you're glued to your inbox all day, let's fix that. The right system sets you free to close deals, to identify and talk to the right leads, while the AI and automations do the rest. Ready to see how this all fits into your pipeline? Let's talk and get you a clear plan.
